title: Project Week
author: Kevin Chuang
body: My team and I worked on a online shop interface. My team members were Tomi Inouye and Tim Nguyen.

title: Vote Tracker
author: Kevin Chuang
body: This project had us track votes for a kitten voting site. It took a lot of time for me but in the end it was worth it for the kittens.

title: Donut Shop
author: Kevin Chuang
body: This project was the most delicious of all of them. We made a site that predicted sales for each location of Top Pot donuts.

title: Guessing Game
author: Kevin Chuang
body: This was our very first project for Codefellows 201. This site was a simple guessing game about us and we will track how many of the questions people get right.
